import React, { PureComponent, useDebugValue } from 'react' import {Link,Route} from 'react-router-dom'; import SalesPerson from "./salesperson"; import SaleSmall from "./salesmall"; import "../invoice/invoicesmall"; class sale extends PureComponent { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { active:false, sales:[{no:'1',date:'02/02/2020',name:'Suresh Goel',invoicecount:'1',sales:'50000',saleswt:'52000'}, {no:'2',date:'04/02/2020',name:'Rohit Bansal',invoicecount:'2',sales:'60000',saleswt:'65000'}], selectedId:'', item:'' } } cancel = (event) => { console.log(this.state.active) this.setState({active:false,selectedId:'',item:''}) } setIdHandler=(no)=>{ let saleIndex=this.state.sales.findIndex(sale=>sale.no===no); let item; if(saleIndex!==-1) { item=this.state.sales[saleIndex]; this.setState({selectedId:no,item,active:true}); } else { this.setState({selectedId:'',item:'',active:false}); } } render() { return (

Sales

Date Name Invoice Count Sales Sales with tax
02/02/2020 1 52,000 53,000
) } } export default sale
